text: Hi everyone - I have some questions about custom CRM cards as described here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards>
Is this the right channel to use? Btw I have read the docs, but am not finding the information I need.

Specifically, the docs have found seem to assume that these custom cards will be seen in the context of a HubSpot integration into an external website, but I was under the impression that the cards could be used within HubSpot, that is, at some location under "<http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com>"
Can someone inform me whether that is correct?  If it is correct, is there documentation anywhere about how to use this cards within the HubSpot dashboard / console?
I would try posting this to our <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel, they may be able to help you in there
